alert.note: Alert for Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lamar County through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Blossom, or 13 miles northeast of Paris, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Blossom, Lake Crook, Powderly, Camp Maxey, Pat Mayse Lake, Arthur City, Novice, Sun Valley, Faught, Midcity and Chicota. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
